text: O prorok! Kogda pridut k tebe veruyushchiye zhenshchiny, prisyagaya tebe v tom, chto oni nichego ne budut pridavat' Allakhu v sotovarishchi, i ne budut krast', prelyubodeystvovat' ili ubivat' svoikh detey, i ne budut privodit' lzhi, izmyshlyaya yeye pred svoimi rukami nogami, i ne budut oslushivat'sya tebya v odobryayemom, to primi ikh prisyagu i prosi dlya nikh proshcheniya u Allakha, - ved' Allakh - proshchayushchiy, miloserdnyy
